entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder source generator doesn't work with Azure ClientOptions #94071
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in DecryptEnvelopedOctetStringWithExtraData (linux x64) #94067
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code without a using for a Type #94065
    9.0.0
  • In .NET7 code using Linq.Expressions on iOS crashes unless interpreter is enabled. It did not crash in xamarin-ios. #94063
  • ILLink analyzer analysis holes around dynamic objects #94057
    9.0.0
  • CA1861 reporting for inline arrays in constructors of static properties #94053
  • Could Dynamic PGO be used to augment AOT compilation? #94052
  • [MT][browser] `TestCancelAsync` failure #94050
  • [API Proposal]: Add rendezvous channel without buffer #94046
  • DllImport with SuppressGCTransition causes PAL_SEHException with a hosted runtime in release configuration. #94029
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_BF16 #94028
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_I8MM #94027
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_FP16 #94026
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_F64MM #94025
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_F32MM #94024
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: scatter stores #94023
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: maths #94022
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: mask #94021
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: bit manipulate #94020
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: gather loads #94019
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: fp #94018
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: counting #94017
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: bitwise #94015
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: scatter stores #94014
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a factory for creating disposables. #94012
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: stores #94011
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: maths #94009
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: bit manipulation #94008
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: gather loads #94007
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: loads #94006
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: fp #94005
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: firstfaulting #94004
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: counting #94003
    9.0.0
  • CoreCLR replaces methods in BitConverter with a exteremely slower version #94001

Closed

  • Support of partition scoped and partition singleton service registration in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #92012
    Future
  • [ILink][browser][debug] Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.DynamicMemberReferenceOperation #94016
    9.0.0
  • [mono] build fails with newer compiler on windows #93922
    9.0.0
  • Reload configuration not work for named options add with BindConfiguration extension method. #85665
    Future
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.cmd #93839
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Failure `Expected: 1 to be greater than 1 Random character at position 0.` #94040
  • [MT][browser] `System.Collections.ObjectModel.Tests.PublicMethodsTest.RemoveAtTest` failures #94045
  • [MT][browser] Failed to execute 'getRandomValues' on 'Crypto' #94047
  • [MT][browser] `An item with the same key has already been added.` #94049
  • [MT][browser] `DynamicCSharpRunTest` failure #94048
  • [MT][browser] Duplicated attribute failures #94039
  • [MT][browser] `System.Reflection.Metadata.Tests.LargeTablesAndHeapsTests.Guids` failures #94044
  • [MT][browser] ` System.Tests.GuidTests` failures #94043
  • [MT][browser] `System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.RandomNumberGeneratorTests` failures #94041
  • 100GB memory usage in .NET 8 RC-2 and RC-1 #93966

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Update trim/aot analyzer to run on generated code #94069
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Added the LOHThreshold public key to the GC Config. #94068
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Error out for AOT with no il trimming #94064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support IValidatableObject for nested model types in options source gen #94062
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.1
  • Update `http.client.request.duration` metric description #94061
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fixup file type names. #94059
    blocking, area-Interop-mono
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 16 #94056
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Provide Extensions.Hosting.Systemd package readme #94055
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [MT][browser] Disabling tests failing in the last two weeks on MT. #94051
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Tests.ConversionTests #94042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    os-ios
  • [browser][Wasm.Build.Tests] Use trimmer friendly JSON serialization #94034
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][CI] Add debug smoke test pipeline #94013
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement ThreeLetterISOLanguageName and ThreeLetterISOCountryName in hybrid mode #94010
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [SuperPMI] nativeaot collections build fix #94000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update library-servicing doc to mention 8.0 #94002
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Simplify of OffsetToStringData as it's done on coreclr #93987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix typo in live analyzer reference configuration #94060
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Add Label support in new ILGenerator #93565
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix analyzer assert and add dynamic object tests #94058
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove xunit.assert from S.C.I rd.xml #93991
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix double delims at the end of dirnames in tpa string when using corerun #93962
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono] Suppress few more MSVC warnings #93923
    area-Build-mono
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Add comment explaining flag usage #94054
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][jit] Improved imm64 for negative numbers #93602
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix the perf issue in TensorPrimitives.MinMaxCore #93944
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Update library-servicing doc to mention 8.0 #93993
    documentation, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT: Log more info to help debug CI #93899
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: move return merging earlier #93997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[arm64] Addressing modes for SIMD (#67490)" #93981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for UnsafeAccessorKind.FieldOffset (#45152) #93946
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement PriorityQueue.Remove #93994
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update diasymreader version to 16.11.29-beta1.23404.4 #93998
    needs-area-label
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte_Vector not taken on ARM64 #90527
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/7.0-staging] do not contain `LEA` if offset < 0` #93992
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93902
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat misses a breaking change where an interface removes a method that was present on a base interface #36502
  • Wrong version of NET6 Runtime Pack in _RuntimePackInWorkloadVersion6 msbuild variable in 6.0.24 #36501
  • For workload feature bands, treat `-rtm` preview versions the same as the stabilized, non-preview versions #36500
  • Can you try setting when you have minor .net runtime #36498

Closed

  • `ProjectReference` does not import build.props/build.targets to like `PackageReference` does #35704

PullRequests

Created

  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Upgrade Ubuntu image for Template Engine pipeline to 2204 #36503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip a templating test when run internally #36499
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2302287 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • add Internal args to AOT tests #36480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add $(_InternalRuntimeDownloadArgs) to Aot Helix Tests #36479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Silence workload install logging on `dotnet --info` and related commands. #36443
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS Code project system doesn't watch for potential .editorconfig files #70590
  • Primary constructors fixer creates invalid code around nested class constructor parameters #70586
  • C# intellisense integration tests are flaky #70582
  • Roslyn unable to evaluate local variables on Windows Forms on file with Unicode characters #70580
  • Create an integration test for validate the Roslyn build scripts on incoming arcade PRs #70579
  • System.NullReferenceException - while using a SpeculativeSemanticModel outside of a regular method body #70575
  • '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' should not nullify diagnostic severity settings for 'DiagnosticId' in globalconfig #70570
    17.10
  • Generate Method inside a static lambda should generate a static method #70565
  • Primary constructors: Add node for primary parameter variables #70564

Closed

  • C# out param is not reported as an error in visual studio if a local function is called. #69775
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34226.35 #70576
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34226.21 #70574

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable flaky test #70589
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add restore support to the language server #70588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not allocate unused fields for primary constructor parameters in a state machine type. #70587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Remove usage of CWT in syntactic classifier #70584
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make struct type into a record. #70581
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to a different Editor API to fix test flakiness #70578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' does not nullify globalconfig severity setting #70572
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump Razor to 7.0.0-preview.23525.7 #70568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70585
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure errors are reported when compiler is unable to emit a required attribute. #70556
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable flaky tests #70583
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Handle authorization exceptions when reading files #70558
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70577
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70567
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix regression in definite assignment analysis for out parameters in presence of local functions. #70563
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround issue #70570 #70571
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70569
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Apply the GitHub Copilot workaround to new-framework integration tests #70561
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Adjust incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of bugs found in "use collection expression" #70539
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR feedback and further cleanup/sharing in extract method code. #70481
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP - Remove IObjectWritable #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run analyzer consistency checks on .NET Core #70517
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel Picks the Wrong SSL Certificate #51688
  • Support for Pushed Authorization Requests in OidcHandler #51686
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #51684
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #51683
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51682
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51681
  • Use "FluentUI for Blazor 3" for Templates and CRUD #51680
  • Failing Test(s): RequestPathBaseTests #51679
  • ASP .NET 8 RC2 Routing & UseStaticFiles with Additional Assembly #51677
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client NuGet package has invalid XML #51675
  • Support a better version of post/redirect/get #51674
  • Blazor WASM significant slower load time in MS Edge Dev #51670
  • app.UsePathBase(pathBase) add support to read pathbase from request header to handle multitenant application #51669
  • How can I host multiple web apps in one kestresl on Linux? #51667

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #51651
  • Was Username field really removed in .Net 8 rc-1? #50702
  • Blazor ASP.NET Core Hosted on Azure : error with JwtBearer #51071
  • .Net8 Identity with ef core #51129
  • Confirmation email sent after registering user via Identity API has link with relative path, should be only code #51146
  • Perf improvement: json #51650
  • Skip several Http3RequestTests #50833
  • Blazor Auto RC2 is unresponsive in server mode #51356
  • Failed to load dotnet.js on InteractiveWebAssembly render mode #51384

PullRequests

Created

  • Show user friendly error when network requests fail #51690
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Remove extra quote. #51685
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix trimming issue affecting Blazor apps with WebAssembly interactivity #51665
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Unquarantined some HTTP/3 tests #51668
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 23523.1 #51588
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Documenting the new help-wanted process #51664
    area-infrastructure
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 7.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Optimize CancellationToken handling #51660
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Respect "grpc-status-details-bin" trailer on error response #51394
    area-grpc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update area-owners.md #51647
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26

Issues

Closed

  • Just a few feature ideas #3975
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential off-by-one error when using ScrollTo in CollectionView with a header. #18389
  • Preferences crash when debugging in Windows #18385
  • Design time type converters are needed #18383
  • Default MAUI Blazor app always has title 'BlazorWeb-CSharp' and doesn't open default file #18382
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix iOS Visual Runner so that all tests pass consistently #18378
    .NET 8 SR1
  • ListView not visible in Android for Net 8 in AbsoluteLayout if Width/Height not set #18377
  • Android - Event handler BatteryInfoChanged unsubscribe crashes when no subscribe has happened before #18376
    Backlog
  • Send SMS without opening default messaging app #18375
  • [Android,iOS] Real device crash on navigation #18372
  • iOS Shell navigating from a modal results in navigation bar color dissapearing #18371
  • [MAUI]Entering some text by PC keyboard or On-Screen Keyboard won't make the label turn green for API33 emulator. #18370
  • iOS SearchBar Unfocused Event not fired, Keyboard not disappearing. #18369
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState' #18368
  • CollecitionView snaps on scroll although snapping is disabled #18367
  • [Maui Embedded] DisconnectHandler not called when view is closed/disposed #18366
  • Many controls (mainly iOS) are not collected by GC #18365

Closed

  • FadeTo not completing on Samsung devices with visibility enhancement "Remove animations" turned on #16476
    .NET 8 GA
  • Animation CallBack action not invoked when enabled the battery-saver in Android device. #16478
    .NET 8 GA
  • maui .net7.0 DisplayAlert button hide on android 8.1 ? #18017
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] CollectionView with bound text of varying lengths does not properly measure all items #16234
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button.BorderColor not working on some platforms #18261
  • [WinUI] Top left corner of the TitleBar is currently unclickable when you update to WinAPPSDK 1.4 #17356
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst Picker not working #18363
  • Something isn't working #18116
  • .NET MAUI MacCatalyst Menu Bar items count problem #18054

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Device Info Test API 33 #18390
  • Fix project name substitution in Blazor template nav menu and "VS install" prompt #18388
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA
  • Add device test for PR #18356 #18387
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net8.0] Update stable branding #18384
    .NET 8 GA
  • Merge net8.0 into main #18380
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • .NET 8 template tweaks #18379
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/release/8.0.1xx@b48acafb 34.0.39 #18381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Don't run 13.7 on xcode15 #18374
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Partially revert "[Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout (#14532) #18356
  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [dependabot] Limit to 0 pr's #18346
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [net8.0] Bump xharness for rtm #18353
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
